update st_make_frend set create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_numbers = #{maxNumbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_complate = #{isComplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complate_date = #{complateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select id, create_man, max_numbers, place, type, create_date, is_complate, complate_date, activity_name,create_man_phone from st_make_frend
is_valid=1
and max_numbers <= #{maxNumbers}
and create_man like concat('%',#{createMan},'%')
and activity_name like concat('%',#{activityName},'%')
select id, create_man, max_numbers, place, type, create_date, is_complate, complate_date, activity_name from st_make_frend where is_valid = 1 and activity_name = #{activity_name}
mapper.update:
update st_make_frend set is_valid = 0, is_complate = '已取消'
where id = #{id}
